title: Best of The Program | Guests: Justin Haskins & Sharyl Attkisson | 11/19/20
description:
Georgia Rep. Barry Loudermilk joins to discuss the Senate runoffs, voting irregularities, and the fight between Sen. Lindsey Graham and Georgia’s secretary of state. The Heartland Institute’s Justin Haskins shows how the socialists’ strategy to take over Democratic strongholds is working and discusses the New York Times calling the Great Reset a “baseless conspiracy.” Investigative reporter Sharyl Attkisson talks how journalists are becoming propagandists and her new book, “Slanted.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
